Have experience with this business? Write a Review. ★★★☆☆ Chili Cheese Fries! Kelly J. | Insider Guru | Rank: 318 3 Hamburger Express
This fast food restaurant has DEE-licious hamburgers and my favorite thing to order is their famous chili cheese fries! They make a few different types of foods here. They go to schools and cater events such as back to school night. It helps bring more kids and parents to the night events! January 23, 2009 Report Abuse
Was this review helpful to you? ★★★★☆ Homey restaurant! Craig W. | Insider | Rank: 21,818 4 Hamburger Express
This restaurant has a nice family restaurant atmosphere and offers a variety of American and Mexican breakfast and lunch foods.
They provide decent-sized food portions.
Orders are placed at the counter and you receive your food on a plastic plate and metal utensils to take back to your booth. They have a plush animal crane game machine. December 23, 2008 Report Abuse
